title: Episode 6 - Sergeant D from Stuff You Will Hate
itunes:title: Episode 6 - Sergeant D from Stuff You Will Hate
description:
I sit down with one of the most pervasive truth teller/shit talker on the internet currently (okay, I may be exaggerating a little bit) about how he formed his writing voice, why metal fans are dumb and how stupid it is to "grow up" out of certain musical styles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
